name: Marble Madness
description: The objective is simple - roll your marbles to the goal line. But add spectacular 3D runways, breathtaking cliffs, deadly enemies and non-stop craziness - and Marble Madness becomes one of the most exciting, challenging and addicting games you've ever played! Speed across dazzlingraceways, complete with cliffs, hills, ramps, and hairpin turns. Use pipelines, catapults and waves to find shortcuts to the goal line.
